short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a context menu to run local YAKjs commands.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The YAKjs context menu only works with a local installed YAKjs running on the default port.

For more information about YAKjs see www.yakjs.com 

The context menu allows to run commands and presets of your local YAKjs instance.
See http://www.yakjs.com/api/commands.html for more information about the command API.
